topic.title: Discharge Medications Section (entries optional) (V3) - conformance rules

section.p: Known Subclasses: Discharge Medications Section (entries required) (V3)

This section contains the medications the patient is intended to take or stop after discharge. Current, active medications must be listed. The section may also include a patient's prescription history and indicate the source of the medication list.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7816, CONF:1198-10396, CONF:1198-32561 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15359)/@code="10183-2" Hospital Discharge Medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15360, CONF:1198-32480)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7820, CONF:1198-15490)
Conforms to Discharge Medication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35:2016-03-01)
SHALL conform to Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15359)/@code="10183-2" Hospital Discharge Medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15360, CONF:1198-32480)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7818, R2.1=CONF:1198-7818)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7819, R2.1=CONF:1198-7819)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7820, CONF:1198-15490)
Conforms to Discharge Medication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35:2016-03-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7816, CONF:10396 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.11"

Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15359)/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15360)
Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7818, R2.1=CONF:1198-7818)
Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7819, R2.1=CONF:1198-7819)

Consol Hospital Discharge Medications Section Entries Optional If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7883) Conforms to Discharge Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
